meanings.definition: A disease of birds caused by the bacterium Chlamydia psittaci, transmissible to humans.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian diagnosed the parrot with ornithosis.
meanings.sent2: Bird owners should be aware of the risks of ornithosis spreading to humans.
meanings.sent3: The parrot joked that ornithosis was the bird version of a cold.
meanings.sent4: The spread of ornithosis in the aviary was like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The vivid image of ornithosis made the bird's illness unforgettable.

meanings.definition: An infectious disease of birds characterized by inflammation of the respiratory tract.
meanings.sent1: The zookeepers took precautions to prevent the spread of ornithosis among the birds.
meanings.sent2: The avian vet treated the canaries suffering from ornithosis.
meanings.sent3: The chirping of the birds with ornithosis sounded like a symphony of coughs.
meanings.sent4: The outbreak of ornithosis in the flock was a storm of sickness.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the sick birds with ornithosis was a poignant reminder of their vulnerability.
